name: Noha Trading Company
description: supplier of high quality nautical instru
overview:
Established in the year 1996, at Roorkee (Uttarakhand, India), we, “Noha Trading Company”, are renowned as the leading manufacturer, trader, wholesaler and supplier of a comprehensive assortment of Nautical Instruments, Antique Instruments, Surveying Instruments, Brass & Aluminum Instruments, etc. Our offered range of products encompasses Clocks, Binoculars, Telescopes, Telegraphs, Sand Timers, Nautical Sextants, Magnifiers, Lights, Armillaries, Diving Helmets, etc.

Our Products: Antique Binocular Nautical Telescopes Antique Telegraphs Antique Sand Timers

Infrastructure: We have constructed an advanced infrastructural base that is equipped with all the latest amenities that are required for the production and delivery of the finest quality range of Nautical Instruments, Antique Instruments, Surveying Instruments, Brass & Aluminum Instruments, etc.

Team: We have with us experienced team of adept professionals that possess required knowledge of this industry in their respective fields. They are highly qualified and skilled with minutest details of the production process and the entire business operations.

Quality Standards: Quality of our product line is the main source behind our great success and we never compromise on it. For the fabrication of our product assortment, we procure premium quality basic material from the certified vendors of the industry.
